directive.name: Context-First Auditing
directive.rule: Before performing any architectural, security, or quality audit, the AI MUST first read `dev-work/evaluations/EVALUATION_INDEX.md` and `SESSION_CONTEXT.md`.
If a recent evaluation exists for a component that has not been modified (verified via CHANGELOG.md), the AI must reuse the existing evaluation instead of re-scanning the files.

directive.name: Evaluation Persistence
directive.rule: All evaluation outputs (SWOTs, Security Audits, PRDs, etc.) MUST be stored in `USER SPACE/dev-work/evaluations/`.
Evaluations must be timestamped and linked to a specific Git commit hash or Version ID.

directive.name: Incremental Scanning
directive.rule: In "Deep Audit" mode, the AI should only perform full-file reads on files that have changed since the last recorded evaluation.
For unchanged files, the AI should rely on the persistent summaries in the evaluations folder.

directive.name: Token Efficiency
directive.rule: Prioritize reading Markdown summaries over raw source code when the goal is "Understanding" rather than "Refactoring".
